content.rendered:
Bond with Enigma Royale

Dash of flavors

Timeless-classical-futuristic piece of art built in glass to capture all nuances of nature; giving our patrons an unparalleled dining experience.

One of the largest modern conceptualized restaurants in the country; spread over 16000 Sq. ft. of space divided between 4 floors. Each level of Enigma offers a different culinary experience. All the levels are easily accessible by lift and equipped with private  toilets for convenience.

Chefs

Growing our own food

Zudora is the All-Day Dining level that seats 100 covers, flaunting a live kitchen and a widespread buffet. Aglass covered roof means best of both worlds, open to sky and indoor dining!
